EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.11-10-2016
EmailTemplate.subject: Delivery With No Post Codes, Focusing on Allies, and Balanced Teams
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NOVEMBER 10, 2016 <[[https://medium.com/actionable-data/delivery-in-a-land-with-no-postcodes-10e063ceb824#.tgojcwn28]]> Delivery in a Land with No Postcodes Dat Tran explains how Pivotal Data Science solved for delivering packages in Arab countries with no post codes. Read More <[[https://medium.com/actionable-data/delivery-in-a-land-with-no-postcodes-10e063ceb824#.tgojcwn28]]> <[[https://youtu.be/7xzZpt2e6nI]]> Focus on Allies Valerie Aurora explains why allies have more time, energy, and influence to change tech culture than the targets of oppression, and describes a dozen skills every ally should develop. Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/7xzZpt2e6nI]]> <[[https://www.siliconrepublic.com/enterprise/pivotal-cloud-foundry-5-minute-cio-jamie-monserrate]]> The Five-Minute CIO: Jamie Monserrate Silicon Republic interviews Jamie Monserrate, Head of Engineering at Pivotal Cloud Foundry in Dublin. Check it Out <[[https://www.siliconrepublic.com/enterprise/pivotal-cloud-foundry-5-minute-cio-jamie-monserrate]]> <[[https://youtu.be/YFtuS3wUpLs]]> Pivotal and DBS Fireside Chat At Cloud Expo Asia 2016, David Gledhill, Group CIO and Head of Technology & Operations of DBS, sat down with Sean Lee from Pivotal to discuss how they are now able to innovate at start-up speeds and their digital transformation journey. Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/YFtuS3wUpLs]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/what-is-happening-to-the-data-warehouse-market]]> What is Happening to the Data Warehouse Market? Jeff Kelly speaks to a group of Pivotal data engineering leaders and Pivotal’s Head of Data Sales about what they are hearing from customers and prospects that are trying to make sense of their data warehouse options. Listen to the Episode <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/what-is-happening-to-the-data-warehouse-market]]> <[[https://youtu.be/h_2Yeiy-vSA]]> Tales of a Balanced Team In this talk, an Engineer, Designer, and Product Manager show us how they stayed aligned and worked together as a balanced team. Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/h_2Yeiy-vSA]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/40-rebasing-your-wobble-detector-industrial-iot-and-pivotal]]> “The big, noisy, dirty machines." This week we talk with Pivotal's Saurabh Gupta about the Internet of Things, CenturyLink buying Level 3, new MacBooks and Surfaces, AI market-sizing hijinks, and an example of cloud-native business thinking in the hotel industry. Listen to the Episode <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/40-rebasing-your-wobble-detector-industrial-iot-and-pivotal]]> Upcoming Events 11/14 Cloud-Native Roadshow, St. Louis <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/stlouis]]>
11/15 Minds + Machines, San Francisco <[[https://www.ge.com/digital/events/minds-and-machines-2016]]>

11/17 Adapt or Die, Chicago <[[http://apigee.com/api-management/#/eventdetail/51]]>
